ai.grakn.graql.internal.query

Class QueryBuilderImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • ai.grakn.graql.internal.query.QueryBuilderImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    QueryBuilder

    public class QueryBuilderImpl
extends Object
implements QueryBuilder
    A starting point for creating queries.

    A QueryBuiler is constructed with a GraknGraph. All operations are performed using this graph. The user must explicitly commit or rollback changes after executing queries.

    QueryBuilderImpl also provides static methods for creating Vars.

    Author:
    Felix Chapman
